content.raw:
Using 1.9.0:

~~~
$ gazebo worlds/empty.world
Gazebo multi-robot simulator, version 1.9.0
Copyright (C) 2013 Open Source Robotics Foundation.
Released under the Apache 2 License.
http://gazebosim.org

Gazebo multi-robot simulator, version 1.9.0
Copyright (C) 2013 Open Source Robotics Foundation.
Released under the Apache 2 License.
http://gazebosim.org

Msg Waiting for master.Msg Waiting for master
Msg Connected to gazebo master @ http://127.0.0.1:11345
Msg Publicized address: 192.168.1.200

Msg Connected to gazebo master @ http://127.0.0.1:11345
Msg Publicized address: 192.168.1.200
^Cpure virtual method called
terminate called without an active exception
~~~

(relevant part of) backtrace from resulting core:
~~~
$ gdb gzclient core
Core was generated by `gazebo worlds/empty.world'.
Program terminated with signal 6, Aborted.
#0  0x00007fccb44da425 in __GI_raise (sig=<optimized out>)
    at ../nptl/sysdeps/unix/sysv/linux/raise.c:64
64	../nptl/sysdeps/unix/sysv/linux/raise.c: No such file or directory.
(gdb) bt
#0  0x00007fccb44da425 in __GI_raise (sig=<optimized out>)
    at ../nptl/sysdeps/unix/sysv/linux/raise.c:64
#1  0x00007fccb44ddb8b in __GI_abort () at abort.c:91
#2  0x00007fccb4e2c69d in __gnu_cxx::__verbose_terminate_handler() ()
   from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libstdc++.so.6
#3  0x00007fccb4e2a846 in ?? () from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libstdc++.so.6
#4  0x00007fccb4e2a873 in std::terminate() () from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libstdc++.so.6
#5  0x00007fccb4e2b28f in __cxa_pure_virtual () from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libstdc++.so.6
#6  0x00007fccb8537dc0 in message (this=<optimized out>)
    at /usr/include/boost/system/error_code.hpp:350
#7  gazebo::transport::Connection::OnReadHeader<boost::_bi::bind_t<void, boost::_mfi::mf1<void, gazebo::transport::PublicationTransport, std::string const&>, boost::_bi::list2<boost::_bi::value<gazebo::transport::PublicationTransport*>, boost::arg<1> > > > (this=0x7fcc90000d40, _e=..., _handler=...)
    at /home/gerkey/code/drc/gazebo/gazebo/transport/Connection.hh:235
~~~
